name: A regretful and somewhat unfortunate meet up
name_original: A regretful and somewhat unfortunate meet up
description:
Shipwrecked on a desert island, a trail of footsteps lead you to a lost man who makes a split-second decision on what to have for lunch.

Made with Bitsy for bitsy jam with the theme being "shipwreck". For most of the time I was working on this I for some reason confused the theme for being "sunken" instead of "shipwrecked". Found the general concept of the game still somewhat worked with the theme so hopefully it should be ok as a submission.

Submitting this version for now to the jam, need to work on making the audio work so it can play, also want to flesh out the characters in the story a bit better to give the game a better and clearer context. It's not any major work so I should be able to finish it properly and update it in not too long a time.

Music: Palms and Seagulls by Timecrawler 82, found on freemusicarchive.org
